attributes.action: Get the financial institutions to cancel, mortgage and loan payments for 3months
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this as the financial institutions won't do it on their own, and after most of the banks were bailed out with tax payers money the government should force the institutions to give people a three month amnesty of mortgage and loan payments.
attributes.background: Get financial institutions to cancel mortgage and loan payments for 3 months, to allow people who have been told to self isolate. The safety they can do so and won't have financial problems when we come out the other side of this Corona Virus.
